DataElement.preferredName: Feces Per Day Screening Timepoint Baseline Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the baseline stools per day at the time of screening.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Feces Trial Screening Timepoint Baseline Per Day
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The material discharged from the bowel during defecation.  It consists of undigested food, intestinal mucus, epithelial cells, and bacteria._A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._A starting point to which things may be compared._For each, generally denoting a ratio._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The material discharged from the bowel during defecation.  It consists of undigested food, intestinal mucus, epithelial cells, and bacteria.

Concepts.definition: The material discharged from the bowel during defecation.  It consists of undigested food, intestinal mucus, epithelial cells, and bacteria.

Property.preferredName: Trial Screening Timepoint Baseline Per Day
Property.preferredDefinition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.:A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.:A starting point to which things may be compared.:For each, generally denoting a ratio.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.
A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.
A starting point to which things may be compared.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for MHRI GU IRB# 2015-0547: HALT-D protocol, Bowel Movement Endpoint form. 6/6/17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Number value to represent the number of something happening or counted in one day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for MHRI GU IRB# 2015-0547: HALT-D protocol, Bowel Movement Endpoint form. 6/6/17 mc
